description: FastAPI router module for task management API, including CRUD operations and task status updates, interfacing with a SQL database.

methods.name: row_to_task_out
methods.description: Converts a SQLAlchemy row object to a TaskOut schema instance.

methods.name: create_task
methods.description: Creates a new task entry in the database and returns the created task.

methods.name: list_tasks
methods.description: Retrieves and returns a list of all tasks.

methods.name: get_task
methods.description: Fetches a single task by its ID.

methods.name: update_task
methods.description: Updates fields of an existing task identified by its ID.

methods.name: complete_task
methods.description: Marks a specified task as completed.

methods.name: delete_task
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.
